resources.string:
Quick Attack = Always strikes first. If both Pokemon use this, the one with higher Speed attacks first. Plus 25 PP.

 Iron Tail = The foe is slammed with a steel-hard tail.

 Electro Ball = The user hurls an electric orb at the target.

 Thunderbolt = A strong electrical attack that may also leave the foe paralyzed.



 With Ditto's only move is Transform, both pokemon will have the same moves afterwards!
